content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity network
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole at position (0.5, 1.5)
- Small electric pole at position (2.5, 2.5)
- Connected to lab at position (6.5, 6.5)

### Stone furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Furnace with fuel (coal: 18), producing iron plates (8)

### Stone furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of:
- Furnace with fuel (coal: 7), currently has no ingredients to smelt.

### Wooden chest at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest with no items.

### Lab at position (6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab requiring 10 automation science packs to complete research, currently has no power.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to electric poles not being powered
- Ensure that all electric poles are properly connected to the electricity network to avoid the "NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK" status. 

### Errors when using building box for electric poles
- Review the dimensions and placement of electric poles to avoid errors related to the building box. Make sure the positions are valid and not obstructed.

### Errors when connecting to the lab
- Ensure that the lab has sufficient power and the required ingredients (automation science packs) to function properly. 

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it, as overlapping entities can cause placement errors.
